p: The EO was obtained by hydrodistillation of fresh aerial parts (5 Kg with 10 L of water) for 3 h in a stainless-steel distiller equipped with a Clevenger apparatus, performing three distinct distillations. The EO content was calculated on a moisture-free basis as average. The EO was dried over anhydrous sodium sulfate and stored in sealed amber vials at 4 Â°C.
